columns.id: The unique identifier for each airport.
columns.City: The name of the city where the airport is located.
columns.Country: The name of the country where the airport is situated.
columns.IATA: The three-letter IATA code for the airport.
columns.ICAO: The four-letter ICAO code for the airport.
columns.name: The full name of the airport.

airport.table_description: The table stores information about various airports.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each operating company.
columns.name: The name of the operating company.
columns.Type: The classification of the operating company.
columns.Principal_activities: The main activities performed by the company.
columns.Incorporated_in: The location where the company is incorporated.
columns.Group_Equity_Shareholding: The percentage of equity shareholding in the group.

operate_company.table_description: The table provides details about various operating companies.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each flight.
columns.Vehicle_Flight_number: The alphanumeric code identifying the specific flight.
columns.Date: The date when the flight took place.
columns.Pilot: The name of the pilot operating the flight.
columns.Velocity: The speed of the flight in knots.
columns.Altitude: The height of the flight above sea level in feet.
columns.airport_id: The unique identifier for the airport associated with the flight.
columns.company_id: The unique identifier for the operating company of the flight.

flight.table_description: The table records details of all flights operated by companies.
